title: permanent suspention
body:
Hello
This morning i wanted to log into my league of legends account but i couldnt log in because it said that im permanently suspended. What should i do ?
By the way i didnt get the email from riot games what for i was banned. Actually i want my account back because i have put alot of money to that account.
Thanks for answering!!!

replies.body: Due to the nature of sensitive account info, there isn't much I'd be able to offer here through the boards.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we can provide context as well as assist you individually!  We'll reply back asap!
